A Guide to the Allen Collection of Frank O'Hara Letters 1976.0001
titlestmt.author: Archives & Special Collection staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-07-23 16:20:00 -0400.

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Library

did.unittitle: Allen Collection of Frank O'Hara Letters
did.abstract: Typewritten transcriptions made by Donald Allen of Frank O'Hara letters. Allen collected and transcribed the letters while preparing and editing The Collected Poems of Frank O'Hara.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Typewritten transcriptions made by Donald Allen of Frank O'Hara letters. Allen collected and transcribed O'Hara's letters while preparing and editing The Collected Poems of Frank O'Hara.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Letters are arranged chronologically by date.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Copyright in the unpublished writings of Frank O'Hara in these papers is owned and retained by the Estate of Frank O'Hara.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Allen Collection of Frank O'Hara Letters. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

did.unittitle: Freilicher, Jane (one page out of sequence)
Open Letter in support of Floating Bear
